body_html:
SGTM for keeping them separate functions. still not sure i understand why
the train function doesn't accept an embeddings dict but the inference one
does?

On Mon, Oct 31, 2016 at 1:17 PM, Thang Luong notifications@github.com
wrote:

Yes, I think it's better to keep decode_fn_{train,inference} as separated
functions for now since they take different arguments.

—
